data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mohapatra, Anil, Ray, Dipanjan, Kumar, Vikas (2013): A new fish species of the Genus Hapalogenys (Perciformes: Hapalogenyidae) from the Bay of Bengal, India. Zootaxa 3718 (4): 367-377, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3718.4.6
